ISSUE.TITLE: Client - Accepts blank password on initial password setup
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** When initially setting up the password for the client, it accepts blank password. https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73840223/161031722-5f33f81f-7e7e-4cb6-90e6-3dd3c0fdd02f.mp4 **Steps To Reproduce** 1. On the initial client setup, just press enter to accept blank password 2. Relaunch the client and login using blank password **Release version** Staging and development (dev1.3)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5650 from hummingbot/update-token-list-m (fix) update broken ethereum token list

COMMIT.MESSAGE: (fix) You can't just pass empty or blank passwords #5211 needs to verify both conditions: None for omiting and bool(password.strip()) for only whitespaces. Check if message its ok!
